original_text: ‘Speak to Aaron and say to him, “When you put the lamps on the lampstand, the seven lamps must give light in front of the lampstand.” ’
korean_text: 아론에게 말하여 이르라 등불을 켤 때에는 일곱 등잔을 등잔대 앞으로 비추게 할지니라 하시매

sentences.original_text: When you put the lamps on the lampstand
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 등대 위에 등들을 놓을 때에

sentences.original_text: the seven lamps must give light
